mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xiaoshou_kaipiao(xiaoshou_bianhao,shoupiao_danwei,shibiehao, kaipiao_dizhi, kaipiao_dianhua,kaipiao_yinhang,kaipiao_zhanghao, kaipiao_riqi, kaipiao_jine, kaipiao_shuie,jiashui_heji,beizhu,kaipiao_danwei,xinxi_tuisong,kaipiao_zhuangtai) VALUES (#{xiaoshouBianhao},#{shoupiaoDanwei},#{shibiehao},#{kaipiaoDizhi},#{kaipiaoDianhua},#{kaipiaoYinhang},#{kaipiaoZhanghao},#{kaipiaoRiqi}, #{kaipiaoJine},#{kaipiaoShuie},#{jiashuiHeji},#{beizhu},#{kaipiaoDanwei},#{xinxiTuisong},#{kaipiaoZhuangtai})
mapper.select: select * from xiaoshou_kaipiao where xinxi_tuisong = #{xinxi_tuisong} and kaipiao_zhuangtai = '待开票'

select * from xiaoshou_kaipiao where kaipiao_riqi >= #{start_date} and kaipiao_riqi <= #{stop_date} and shoupiao_danwei like '%' + #{shoupiao_danwei} + '%' and kaipiao_danwei like '%' + #{kaipiao_danwei} + '%' and kaipiao_zhuangtai like '%' + #{kaipiao_zhuangtai} + '%'

select id,bianhao,riqi,kehu,dianpu,cangku,beizhu,xiaoshou_id,chuku_danwei,yewuyuan,jiashui_xiaoji,chuku_id,isnull(xiaoshou_bianhao,'') as xiaoshou_bianhao,isnull(jiashui_heji,0) as jiashui_heji,jiashui_xiaoji-isnull(jiashui_heji,0) as weikai,jiashui_xiaoji-isnull(jiashui_heji,0) as this_kai,1 as isselect from (select * from xiaoshou_chuku as chuku left join (select sum(convert(float,isnull(jiashui_xiaoji,0))) as jiashui_xiaoji,chuku_id from xiaoshou_chuku_item group by chuku_id) as item on chuku.id = item.chuku_id) as chuku left join (select xiaoshou_bianhao,sum(convert(float,isnull(jiashui_heji,0))) as jiashui_heji from xiaoshou_kaipiao group by xiaoshou_bianhao) as kaipiao on chuku.bianhao = kaipiao.xiaoshou_bianhao where jiashui_xiaoji-isnull(jiashui_heji,0) > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE xiaoshou_kaipiao set kaipiao_zhuangtai='已开票' WHERE id = #{id}
